title: Enhancing Business Practice Competency: Course for Improving Scientific Job Competencies Using an E-Learning Evaluation Model

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Systematically diagnosing the quality of e-learning courses by applying the four stages of the PDPP evaluation model (Planning, Development, Process, Product)
Designing and executing PBL projects for solving practical problems in science while collaborating with peers
Evaluating learner engagement, technical support, interaction elements, and proposing improvements in e-learning environments
Developing assessment tools to measure learning effectiveness, satisfaction, and sustainability after course completion
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
